Layout

Vertical and horizontal scroll

Many of the applications you build depsite a complex layout will still fit onto a single page. To help scroll long content alongside shorter content use the scroll() utility function.

tag

A tag element.

direction

One of "horizontal" or "vertical" specifying which direction to scroll overflowing content, defaults to "vertical", in which case the content may croll up and down.
